article.title: Jouas Assigned Multi-Hatted U.N. Command Korea Posts
article.author: Henry Kenyon

tags.tag: Air Component Command Republic of Korea/U.S. Combined Forces Command

article.text: Maj. Gen. Jan-Marc Jouas, USAF, Â has been nominated for appointment to the rank of lieutenant general and assignment as deputy commander, United Nations Command Korea; deputy commander, U.S. Forces Korea; commander, Air Component Command, Republic of Korea/U.S. Combined Forces Command; and commander, Seventh Air Force, Pacific Air Forces, Osan Air Base, Korea.
